plot: Spencer Scott is pushed by comedy club owner Deana and co-worker Haynes to push the boundaries of his humor. He eventually does, at the expense of his friend Lizzy.
title: Happy Wednesday
plot_es: Spencer Scott is pushed by comedy club owner Deana and co-worker Haynes to push the boundaries of his humor. He eventually does, at the expense of his friend Lizzy.
plot_en: Spencer Scott is pushed by comedy club owner Deana and co-worker Haynes to push the boundaries of his humor. He eventually does, at the expense of his friend Lizzy.
